scripts.version:patch: git config --global user.email "you@example.com" && git config --global user.name "Your Name"&&npm version patch -m 'Bump version to %s'
scripts.version:minor: git config --global user.email "you@example.com" && git config --global user.name "Your Name"&&npm version minor -m 'Bump version to %s'
scripts.version:major: git config --global user.email "you@example.com" && git config --global user.name "Your Name"&&npm version major -m 'Bump version to %s'
